abstract: One took a seat in the visitors’ gallery perched above the chamber, and another emerged from a cloakroom with a magazine in hand.
lead_paragraph: Senator Thom Tillis, Republican of North Carolina, wanted a change of perspective. So as the third day of President Trump’s impeachment trial stretched into yet another late night, he climbed a flight of stairs and took a seat in the Senate’s visitors’ gallery perched above the chamber.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
